author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to another Fantasy News episode! 📚🔥 This week is packed with huge updates in the world of books, TV, movies, and publishing. Thank you Wriathmarked for sponsoring today's video: https://www.instagram.com/wraithmarked/?hl=en  From Rebecca Yarros breaking sales records to the rise of e-books (and the AI problem that comes with them), major book cover reveals, and fresh looks at Wheel of Time Season 3 and Warhammer! 

🔥 Topics Covered:

00:00 MERCH ALERT: Get your gear at https://www.danielbgreene.com

02:14 Bye-Bye Book Blurbs? Major publishers are ditching blurbs—what does this mean for authors? https://www.theguardian.com/books/2025/jan/31/simon-schuster-us-imprint-authors-blurbs-books

05:38 Becky With the Good Sales: Onyx Storm dominates the charts, breaking major records. https://people.com/rebecca-yarros-new-book-storms-bestseller-list-onyx-storm-shatters-sales-records-8783719

Numbers on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ieu89m/rebecca_yarros_sells_12_mi
title: Neil Gaiman Sued For $1 Mill, Onyx Storm Shatters Records, DCC Adaptation Leaked ~FN~
